Write Parent Interfaces Method

Short Name: Write Parent Interfaces

Requires: Base Development System

Class: LVClassLibrary Methods

To Use: Create a method.

Writes the interfaces that the referenced class directly inherits from. Use this method to add or remove parents.

Parameters

Data typeNameRequiredDescription
InterfacesNoSpecifies the names of the interfaces to write. All references in the array must be interfaces.
Prompt To Save?NoSpecifies whether to prompt the user to save the modified class.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this method.

Data typeNo return value
Available in Run-Time EngineNo
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemNo
Settable when the VI is runningNo
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes
